tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had  pregnancy consultation done with Poornima madam from initial days. Very friendly and gave us good guidance. Helped us have a normal delivery. She has taken good care and followups on both mother and child health during the course of 9 months. Very satisfied and thanks a lot Madam. Will surely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Mine was a twin pregnancy. Got my babies delivered through C-section. I have been consulting with Dr.Poornima Murthy, since Day-1 and it has been a wonderful journey so far. She is one of the coolest doctors whom I have ever met; she is simply superb and excellent in responding to all our queries, giving crystal clear opinions in all scenarios; She gives simple and perfect solution and never complicates any scenario. She is an epitome of positivity, confidence, calmness and clarity. On the day of delivery, it was a super-perfect feeling I had. There had not been even a pinch of fear in me regarding my cesarean. Poornima Mam handled it seamlessly and got my twin babies outside smoothly!!!  Heartful tones of Thank you to you Poornima Maam!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Poornima Murthy is a very genuine Doctor with a lot of experience. I had my second baby at CloudNine Jayanagar, Normal delivery. She is calm and patient. ******* ********* ******** ************** Tells things frankly and leaves no stone unturned if at all there are any issues. I felt she is quite chilled out and will definitely try for Normal delivery if there are no major risk factors. Would definitely recommend her especially if you want Normal delivery and a smooth pregnancy. Even in the delivery room, I found her calm and cool. She is full of positivity,down to earth, soft spoken and cheerful. Many many thanks to you Dr. Poornima Murthy. 
Pranam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had three visits with Dr. Poornima Murthy, and each time was extremely disappointing. 
During the first visit, she seemed more interested in her phone than addressing my concerns, barely speaking to us for more than three minutes. On the second visit, she was in a rush to leave, again on her phone, and spent a mere five minutes with us.
 The final straw was when I had an emergency, and she was nowhere to be found. Instead of providing immediate assistance, she insisted on making an appointment, even though it was clearly urgent.
 Overall, Dr. Murthy's lack of attention, disinterest, and unavailability during crucial times made the entire experience highly unsatisfactory.
I would advice all the people to think twice before visiting her .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Very straightforward no-nonsense type doctor with a lot of experience.  She tries to give natural remedies and limits medications to only those necessary. I consulted with her in cloud nine and wait times were always less than five mins.  C-section surgery went very smoothly with her. I would definitely recommend Dr Poornima to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: We have been visiting Dr, Poornima murthy rite from my 1st childs birth.... And she a very good doctor and a very warm person, Who understands the patient well. She makes sure to give the rite suggestion and we have always recommended her to our family and friends.

tags: None
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ******* ** ***, very down to earth, simple and straight, never scares the patients. She is been my Gynec for more than 5years, I delivered my first child in 2012 n expecting my 2nd one this Oct 2017. I am very much happier with her and nothing to complain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Amazing personality. There is no day where I don't remember her. She is not less than god to me. She is excellent at work. I had my first baby in cloudnine Jayanagar normal delivery. Case was completely handled by Dr. Poornima Murthy. She was right in every decision regarding my health and baby as well. My baby had health issues after birth and she was there for me at every point with her positive support. Thank you so much Doctor. You are the bestest

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I’m glad that I chose to consult Dr. Poornima Murthy ma’am for my first pregnancy. A very soft spoken and friendly dr. She use to explain everything in detail and would clarify any doubts. I was able to ask my doubts with out any hesitation. She was so calm and use to explain the process from the time when I was admitted for the delivery, where she even tried for a normal delivery to happen. 

I would definitely recommend her.

Thanks a lot Dr. Poornima Murthy ma’am.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I know Dr.Poornima subce my childhood. When i got conceived i decided that she would be my gynecologist.  She is such a positive force in my life. I am allergic to many alopathy medicines and also have panic attacks. She used to be there personally with me when i used to take medicines to see if it gets reaction. 

Also she is very down to earth and listen to us. 

Thanks Dr.Poornima for being with me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is the most down to earth and genuine doctor. She stayed in hospital in night for my wife’s delivery. There were some complications at the last minute and still she went for normal delivery unlike other docs. She is a life saber for us . A 100% recommendation for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Poornima Murthy is the most friendliest and down to earth doctor. She is to the point and very transparent with the patient. Her high spirit and attitude makes the patient very comfortable. I had a very good experience with this doctor and highly recommend her to others as well, if I plan for my second pregnancy without a doubt I’ll be going to her only.

tags: Value for money,
review:
It's my first delivery and covid time I was not having any idea, checked in google. nd saw good reviews of Dr poornima most of the reviews are for normal delivery. Visited to the doctor and felt good, at the time of delivery got lot of pain and suffered whole night, morning one doctor came as poornima was not there she came in the morning ...tht doctor broke my water bag she spoke to poornima I guess and shifted to delivery room.. Poornima came i was in very heavy pain *** ****** ** ******** ** *** ***** **** ***** *** *** * ***** **** ********* ******** She suggested for operation at that moment we don't know what to do we trusted her and did c-section.

I know many women have c section it's common now *** **** *** ******** **** **** **** * ******* *** ****** ***** *** **** *** ********About hospital they just charge you more more and more.

tags: None

tags: None
review: She has been my Gynaec for 3 years now. I had a normal delivery with her perfect guidance, at Cloudnine. She is knowledgeable, humane and best of all- simpler than any other doctor you would come across. She helps you understand the treatment, asks for your opinion and guides you the right way. I opted for my delivery at Cloudnine ONLY because of her. Lovely lady.

review: Loved the doctor so much that we adjusted with the dilapidated room of cloudnine jayanagar. Dr poornima is simple, motherly and ensured I had a normal delivery. Will go to her next time as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: She is fantastic and homely doctor who treats her patients closely with atmost care... She is just expert in her field. Fills confidence in her patients and advice and guides in each and every step..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I visited this lady for PCOD related issue. *** *** **** ** ***** *** was not read to listen the case completely. She was judgmental about my personal life ****** ***** **** ** **** ******* ******** Moreover she was forceful about doing the test right at the hospital not externally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a simple, humble and a polite lady.. Very down to earth.. She explains everything very patiently.. Most important is that she listens to whatever questions we ask.. Most of the doctors just ignores if the patient asks any questions..A very nice doctor.. I chose cloudnine only because she practices only in cloudnine..

tags: None
review: I had been to her for 2nd opinion and I found her to be so well versed... She was always so cool and positive....2 of my co sisters visited her for pregnancy out of which one had a vaginal delivery with epidural...the other sister's pregnancy is still going on...Also 2 of my cousin sisters visited her for pregnancy and both had vaginal deliveries.. She will at any cost opt for normal deliveries...

tags: None
review: I was very clear on what I was asking and none of the questions were directly answered by the doctor. It was all “we’ll see” kind of answers. No direct reply or explanation was given to any of my questions. Additional charges of ₹300 for registration were not mentioned while booking the appointment on Practo. The hospital lab was under maintenance and the reports were to be delayed. The hospital knew this but did not mention anything till they collected the payment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is not friendly at all. she always keeps her mouth shut! 
We everytime has to ask her to explain about the health issue that we have.
She will be in hurry all the time and doesn't talk to the patient properly...
Even though we pay pay 550 for the consultation she just talk to us for 2 min and she call another patient in.
Seriously disappointed and I don't want to recommend this doctor to anyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr Poornima Murthy since I conceived in Feb. Chose this doctor after checking few reviews on Google. I'm extremely satisfied with the motherly care she offered me through my pregnancy. Unlike other doctors she prefers and wants her patients to opt for a normal delivery. Also doesn't force for  unnecessary scans if all parameters are fine. I highly recommend this doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Really happy .....I was in the safe hands .Dr.poornima murthy is a wonderful doctor,she treats patients as friends provides us suggestions...finally Im blessed with baby Girl....I recommend people to have a word with her for safe normal delivery as 90%she opts for normal rather than cesarean.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
